properties.description: Warm Welcome Join us every Wednesday and Saturday mornings from 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM. The Heart will be open with tea, coffee and biscuits. We will be hosting several pop-up events staffed by our partners and Heart residents. No need to book! Just turn up, have a cuppa, meet up with friends and make new ones. https://www.heartofnewhaven.co.uk/
properties.title: The Heart

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 14th November 2024** A free hot breakfast is available and a welcome space for everyone. You are guaranteed a Warm Welcome. Employment and digital services, as well as an opportunity to explore the Bible are also available during this time for those who would wish to.
properties.title: The Welcome Breakfast

properties.address: St. Margarets Parish Church, Fife KY11 4JJ
properties.description: Warm Space, open all day, and to all! We are offering a warm community space where you are welcome to come and make use of our facilities. Whether that be a few games of pool or darts, board games, access to our IT suite, a few games of FIFA on our XBOX, or just a nice friendly chat. We are here for you! Food served in 2 sittings of Lunch (12-2), Dinner (3-5), all free of charge and with takeaway options available
properties.title: Together in Touch

properties.address: St. Ninians Church, Dunfermline, Fife KY11 4HE
